doctor.name: Dr. Md. Shahidul Islam
doctor.specialty: Neurology (Brain, Nerve, Spine, Stroke, Headache) Specialist
doctor.info: Dr. Md. Shahidul Islam is a Neurologist in Kustia. His qualification is MBBS, MD (Neurology). He is a Assistant Professor, Neurology at Kushtia Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Sono Diagnostic Center, Kushtia. Practicing hour of Dr. Md. Shahidul Islam at Sono Diagnostic Center, Kushtia is 4pm to 8pm (Sat to Thu), 10am to 8pm (Fri).

chamber.address: Sono Tower, College Mor, Court Para, Kushtia

doctor.name: Dr. Md. Asadur Rahman (Shamim)
doctor.specialty: Neurology (Brain, Nerve, Stroke, Paralysis) & Medicine Specialist
doctor.info: Dr. Md. Asadur Rahman (Shamim) is a Neuromedicine Specialist in Kushtia. His qualification is MBBS, BCS (Health), MD (Neuromedicine). He is a Assistant Professor, Neurology at Kushtia Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Sono Consultation Center, Kushtia. Practicing hour of Dr. Md. Asadur Rahman (Shamim) at Sono Consultation Center, Kushtia is 3pm to 8pm (Saturday to Thursday), 10am to 8pm (Friday).

chamber.address: Sono Tower 2, Court Para, Kushtia, Bangladesh
